newsitem.title: BOSNIA: Romanian in Bosnia peace force dies in road mishap.
newsitem.headline: Romanian in Bosnia peace force dies in road mishap.

text.p: A Romanian military engineer in the NATO-led peace force in Bosnia died when the road excavator he was driving tipped over and fell down a ravine, an alliance spokesman said on Wednesday.
Major Brett Boudreau said the accident happened during road-building work near the eastern town of Gorazde on Tuesday. The Romanian's name was not released.
